name: df-mon
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6, setvar s7
body: |- wceq(cmon, cmpt(s0, ccat, csb(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), csb(s2, cfv(chom, cv(s0)), cmpo(s3, s4, cv(s1), cv(s1), crab(s5, co(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4)), wral(s6, cv(s1), wfun(ccnv(cmpt(s7, co(cv(s6), cv(s2), cv(s3)), co(cv(s5), co(cop(cv(s6), cv(s3)), cfv(cco, cv(s0)), cv(s4)), cv(s7))))))))))))
comment: Function returning the monomorphisms of the category ` c ` . JFM CAT_1 def. 10. (Contributed by FL, 5-Dec-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
